title: Male tigers fight each other for the right to mate with a female
text:
This is the moment two tigers battle it out over a female just metres from stunned tourists.

Holidaymakers were photographing one of the big cats in the jungle when suddenly it got into a fight with a love rival.

The tigers both stood up on their hind legs and unleashed blows.

Visitors to Ranthambore National Park in Rajasthan, India saw two male tigers fighting

Each tiger attempted to beat off its rival to get the right to mate with the female

It happened inside India's Ranthambore National Park in Rajasthan.

One woman can be heard saying: 'Oh I don't like this.'

There was no obvious winner but the lucky tourists had the best view in the jungle for the heavyweight clash.

A forest official said: 'The age between them is nine years and we believe they fought over the tigress Noor T-39.

'We still do not think that the scuffle has ended yet and we have kept a strong watch over the animals and their activities.'
description: Stunned tourists looked on as a pair of male tigers fought with each other in the Ranthambore National Park in Rajasthan in India for the right to mate with a female.
